Articles.Content:
*Relentless*

*Is likely the best word to describe my newest creation, the Free Trade Conglomerate's*

***Assault Wheel.***

![O8IRlzD.png](http://i.imgur.com/O8IRlzD.png)

***-- Features Include***

*A set of twin double-barreled 50 Cal machine gun turrets*

*A durable chassis*

*A huge ammunition capacity*

*A ridiculously long range*

*A quad reactor power plant*

*A variation without the FTC logo*

***-- Instruction Manual***

*Action Groups -*

1 Activates the turrets, after that, point and click to fire!

*Driving -*

Driving the wheel is a bit fidgety, when you launch, (Note, all controls rely on the fact that the camera is orientated at the VAB after launch, sorry for any confusion,) press 'E' to roll forwards, 'Q' is backwards. 'A' and 'D' are turn left and right, in that order. Only turn when stationary, unless you're an ace and can manage to keep yourself from falling over. 'W' and 'S' are right and left flopping, in that order. Do not press them unless you fell over.

***-- Mods Required***

*BDArmory*

*FTC Custom Logo*

***-- Logo Installation***

Download the file, then drag the folder into the parts folder on the screen

*before*

the GameData directory. The part should appear in with the science parts.
